title: #302 - Leon Trotsky Part 1: From Lev to Leon
itunes:title: #302 - Leon Trotsky Part 1: From Lev to Leon
description: That "Part 1" in the title can only mean one thing. Connor and Dan are diving back into another miniseries, this time on the fiery Russian revolutionary who found himself on the wrong side of the border. This first episode covers Leon Trotsky's early life, his exposure to orthodox Marxism, and hopefully provides a little historical context for listeners not familiar with Russian revolutionary history.
